Name: Voodoo Whisperer Curse of a Legend
About the game: Mentored by one of the most powerful voodoo priestesses in the world, Lillian is learning to use her power. But, a dark force has settled over New Orleans, and Marie Leveau, Lillian’s teacher, has been placed under a curse. The entire town has been put into a deep, dark sleep by a mysterious evil force. Now young Lillian must find allies and uncover the dark secrets of voodoo in order to save her master and free her friends before it is too late. Features: • Save the town of New Orleans from the curse • Dark and spooky atmosphere • Incredible Graphics
